application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
site_name: St Andrews And St Marks Primary School
description: G.0D1N Sycamore Group - Fell 6th & 7th trees from left. Remove deadwood and sever Ivy from remaining trees.T.0D1Q Oak - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level by tip reduction, remove lowest limb to N.W & deadwood.T.0D1U, T.0D1V, T.0D1W Lime x3 - Crown lift to 5m from ground level by removing epicormic growth.T.0JBJ Oak - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level.T.0D2G Silver Birch - Crown lift to 3m from ground level by tip reduction.
